love this shop. Customer service is excellent and the staff working there is so generous and kind. The aÃ§ai bowls are really delicious and a good amount. Will go again

This might be the best pistachio ice cream Iâ€™ve had in Singapore?? ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ you can really taste the pistachio, and I loved that there were tiny bits of pistachio that gave it additional texture and flavour ğŸ’¯

It also wasnâ€™t too sweet and wasnâ€™t too milky, which allowed the pistachio flavour to take centre stage in this scoop of ice cream!

Me and my partner saw the positive reviews of this place and decided to try it on two separate occasions as we live in the vicinity. During our first visit, we bought a double scoop ice cream cone, with dark chocolate and speculous flavours. I felt their dark chocolate flavour was rich and enjoyable and its texture was alright. However, we couldn't say the same for the speculoos that had a rough texture and seemed to be breaking apart in clumps.

On our second visit, we tried the molten lava cake set with chrysanthemum flavoured ice cream. My wife found this flavour too sweet to her liking and we weren't too impressed with the pre-made molten lava cake. It was decent but we wouldn't rave over it.

A gem in the neighbourhood! Exceeded expectation and never expect this quality of ice cream in the neighbourhood area. Freshly made cone pair with the ice cream, itâ€™s just the best combi! I love their Mao Shan Wang, Dark Chocolate and Pistachio. Itâ€™s DA BOMB! Must try if you are nearby!
